0.1) & (x < peak_pos + 0.1)] y_fit = y[(x > peak_pos - 0.1) & (x < peak_pos + 0.1)] # print(x_fit,y_fit) # è¿›è¡Œæ‹Ÿåˆ init_params = [y_fit.max(), peak_pos, 0.01] # åˆå§‹æ‹Ÿåˆå‚æ•°ï¼Œå¯æ ¹æ®å®é™…æƒ…å†µä¿®æ”¹ # print(init_params) try: params, _ = curve_fit(lorentz_func, x_fit, y_fit, p0=init_params) peak_params.append(params) except RuntimeError: # å¦‚æœæ‹Ÿåˆå¤±è´¥åˆ™è·³è¿‡ print("pass") pass# æå–æ¯ä¸ªå³°çš„å¼›è±«æ—¶é—´fre = [params[1] for params in peak_params]relax_times = [1/(2*params[2]) for params in peak_params]print(fre,relax_times)plt.plot(x, y)plt.plot(x[peaks], y[peaks], "x")plt.show() æ–‡ä»¶åˆ¤æ–­åˆ¤æ–­æŸä¸ªæ–‡ä»¶å¤¹æ˜¯å¦å­˜åœ¨123456import osif os.path.exists('æ–‡ä»¶è·¯å¾„'): print('æ–‡ä»¶å¤¹å­˜åœ¨')else: print('æ–‡ä»¶å¤¹ä¸å­˜åœ¨') åˆ¤æ–­æŸä¸ªæ–‡ä»¶æ˜¯å¦å­˜åœ¨12345678import osfilename = "example.txt"if os.path.isfile(filename): print("æ–‡ä»¶å­˜åœ¨")else: print("æ–‡ä»¶ä¸å­˜åœ¨") åˆ—è¡¨è§£æå¼ï¼ˆList comprehensionï¼‰å®ç°çŸ©é˜µè½¬ç½®12345678910matrix = [[1, 2, 3], [4, 5, 6], [7, 8, 9]]transpose = [[row[i] for row in matrix] for i in range(len(matrix[0]))]print(matrix)print(transpose)"""out[[1, 2, 3], [4, 5, 6], [7, 8, 9]][[1, 4, 7], [2, 5, 8], [3, 6, 9]]""" åŒæ—¶éå†ä¸¤ä¸ªåºåˆ—123456789names = ["Alice", "Bob", "Charlie"]ages = [25, 30, 35]for i, (name, age) in enumerate(zip(names, ages)): print(i, name, age)"""0 Alice 251 Bob 302 Charlie 35""" Python çš„è£…é¥°å™¨ï¼ˆDecoratorï¼‰å®ç°å‡½æ•°è¿è¡Œæ—¶é—´çš„è®¡ç®—123456789101112131415161718192021import timedef timing_decorator(func): def wrapper(*args, **kwargs): start_time = time.time() result = func(*args, **kwargs) end_time = time.time() print(f"Function {func.__name__} took {end_time - } return 0;} åœ¨ä¸Šé¢çš„ç¤ºä¾‹ä¸­ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬å®šä¹‰äº†ä¸€ä¸ªå­—ç¬¦ä¸²strå’Œä¸€ä¸ªåŒ…å«è¦æŸ¥æ‰¾çš„å­—ç¬¦é›†çš„å­—ç¬¦ä¸²charsã€‚æˆ‘ä»¬ä½¿ç”¨find_first_ofå‡½æ•°åœ¨strä¸­æŸ¥æ‰¾ç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ªåŒ¹é…å­—ç¬¦é›†sä¸­ä»»ä½•ä¸€ä¸ªå­—ç¬¦çš„ä½ç½®ï¼Œå¹¶å°†ç»“æœå­˜å‚¨åœ¨poså˜é‡ä¸­ã€‚å¦‚æœæ‰¾åˆ°äº†åŒ¹é…é¡¹ï¼Œåˆ™è¾“å‡ºåŒ¹é…çš„å­—ç¬¦å’Œä½ç½®ï¼›å¦åˆ™è¾“å‡ºä¸€æ¡æ¶ˆæ¯è¡¨ç¤ºæ²¡æœ‰æ‰¾åˆ°åŒ¹é…é¡¹ã€‚ è‡ªå®šä¹‰å‡½æ•°vectoræ‹¼æ¥å‡½æ•°å¹¶è°ƒç”¨ c++æ€ä¹ˆå°†ä¸¤ä¸ªäºŒç»´çš„vectoræ‹¼æ¥ï¼Œå®šä¹‰æˆä¸€ä¸ªå‡½æ•°ï¼Œå¹¶å¯ä»¥è°ƒç”¨? è¦å°†ä¸¤ä¸ªäºŒç»´çš„vectoræ‹¼æ¥å¹¶å®šä¹‰æˆä¸€ä¸ªå‡½æ•°ï¼Œæ‚¨å¯ä»¥ç¼–å†™ä¸€ä¸ªå‡½æ•°æ¥æ¥æ”¶ä¸¤ä¸ªäºŒç»´vectorä½œä¸ºå‚æ•°ï¼Œå¹¶å°†å®ƒä»¬æ‹¼æ¥åˆ°ä¸€ä¸ªæ–°çš„vectorä¸­ã€‚ä»¥ä¸‹æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªç¤ºä¾‹å‡½æ•°çš„ä»£ç ï¼š 1234567891011121314151617181920212223242526272829303132333435363738394041424344454647484950515253545556575859606162636465666768#include <iostream>#include <vector>// æ‹¼æ¥ä¸¤ä¸ªäºŒç»´vectorstd::vector<std::vector<int>> concatenateVectors(const std::vector<std::vector<int>>& v1, const std::vector<std::vector<int>>& v2, bool byRow = true){ std::vector<std::vector<int>> result; if (byRow) { // æ‹¼æ¥è¡Œ for (const auto& row : v1) { result.push_back(row); } for (const auto& row : v2) { result.push_back(row); } } else { // æ‹¼æ¥åˆ— for (size_t i = 0; i < v1.size(); ++i) { std::vector<int> row = v1[i]; row.insert(row.end(), v2[i].begin(), v2[i].end()); result.push_back(row); } } return result;}int main(){ std::vector<std::vector<int>> v1 {{1, 2}, {3, 4}}; std::vector<std::vector<int>> v2 {{5, 6}, {7, 8}}; for (const auto& row : result1) { for (const auto& elem : row) { std::cout << elem << " "; } std::cout << std::endl; } std::cout << "Concatenate by column:" << std::endl; for (const auto& row : result2) { for (const auto& elem : row) { std::cout << elem << " "; cout << "Before: " << endl; for (auto& inner_vec : vec) { for (auto elem : inner_vec) { cout << elem << " "; } cout << endl; } delete_first_element(vec); cout << "After: " << endl; for (auto& inner_vec : vec) { for (auto elem : inner_vec) { cout << elem << " "; } cout << endl; } return 0;}void delete_first_element(vector<vector<int>>& vec) { for (auto& inner_vec : vec) { if (!inner_vec.empty()) { inner_vec.erase(inner_vec.begin()); } }}

It is',Numberend program main Fortran90 ä»¥åï¼Œè¯­æ³•è§„èŒƒå¼•å…¥äº†ä¸¤ä¸ªæ ‡å‡†çš„å‡½æ•°ç”¨æ¥äº§ç”Ÿéšæœºæ•°(0 ~1 ä¹‹é—´)ï¼š random_seedå’Œ random_number(å¦‚ä¸Šä»£ç ï¼Œ é€šå¸¸è¿™ä¸¤ä¸ªå‡½æ•°éœ€é…åˆä½¿ç”¨ ) random_seed call random_seed( size , get , put ),ä¸€å…±ä¸‰ä¸ªå‚æ•°ï¼ˆä¸€èˆ¬ä¸€æ¬¡åªèƒ½é€‰æ‹©ä¸€ä¸ªå‚æ•°ä½¿ç”¨ï¼Œè€Œä¸èƒ½ä¸‰ä¸ªä¸€èµ·ä½¿ç”¨ï¼‰sizeæ˜¯è¾“å‡ºå‚æ•°ï¼Œä¼šè¿”å›ç§å­çš„å¤§å°ã€‚åœ¨è·å–æˆ–è®¾ç½®æ–°çš„ç§å­æ—¶ï¼Œè¾“å…¥è¾“å‡ºçš„ç§å­æ•°ç»„ï¼Œå¿…é¡»ä¸sizeçš„å¤§å°ä¸€æ ·ã€‚getæ˜¯è¾“å‡ºå‚æ•°ï¼Œç”¨æ¥è¿”å›å½“å‰çš„ç§å­ã€‚å¿…é¡»æ˜¯integerç±»å‹çš„æ•°ç»„ï¼ˆæ•°ç»„å¤§å°å–å†³äºsizeï¼‰ï¼Œé€šå¸¸å¾ˆå°‘ä½¿ç”¨å®ƒã€‚putæ˜¯è¾“å…¥å‚æ•°ï¼Œç”¨æ¥è®¾ç½®æ–°çš„ç§å­ã€‚åªè¦random_seedä¸åŠ å…¥ä»»ä½•å‚æ•°ï¼Œåˆ™è‡ªåŠ¨ç”¨æ—¶é—´è®¾ç½®ç§å­ã€‚æ‰€ä»¥è¿™ä¸ªæ“ä½œå¯ä»¥ç®€åŒ–ä¸ºcall random_seed()æˆ–call random_seed random_number ç”¨æ¥äº§ç”Ÿéšæœºæ•°çš„ï¼Œå½“æˆ‘ä»¬éœ€è¦äº§ç”Ÿæ—¶ï¼Œè°ƒç”¨å®ƒå°±å¯ä»¥äº†ã€‚æ•´ä¸ªç¨‹åºå¯ä»¥ä¸é™æ¬¡æ•°åœ°è°ƒç”¨å®ƒã€‚call random_number(R)è¿™é‡Œçš„Rå¿…é¡»æ˜¯realç±»å‹ï¼Œå¯ä»¥æ˜¯å•å˜é‡ï¼Œä¹Ÿå¯ä»¥æ˜¯æ•°ç»„ã€‚è°ƒç”¨åï¼ŒRçš„å€¼å˜ä¸ºå½“å‰çš„ï¼ˆä¼ªï¼‰éšæœºæ•°ã€‚ æ±‚ä¸¤ä¸ªæ•´æ•°çš„æœ€å¤§å…¬çº¦æ•°1234567891011121314151617181920212223242526! !ç¢¾è½¬ç›¸é™¤æ³•ï¼šå¦‚27å’Œ6ï¼Œå…ˆç”¨27é™¤ä»¥6ï¼Œä½™æ•°ä¸º3ã€‚å†ç”¨6é™¤ä»¥3ï¼Œä½™æ•°ä¸ºé›¶ï¼Œå³3ä¸ºæœ€å¤§å…¬çº¦æ•°ã€‚! program main! read *, m,n! if(m.lt.n) then! k=m; m=n; n=k! end if! k=mod(m,n)! do while (k/=0)! m=n; n=k; k=mod(m,n)! end do! print *, 'æœ€å¤§å…¬çº¦æ•°ï¼',n! end program mainprogram main read *, m,n do while (m/=n) do while (m>n) m=m-n end do do while (n>m) n=n-m end do end do print *, 'æœ€å¤§å…¬çº¦æ•°ï¼',mend program main do whileçš„ä¸€èˆ¬å½¢å¼ä¸ºï¼š[æ„é€ å] DO WHILE (é€»è¾‘è¡¨è¾¾å¼) æ±‚æ­£å¼¦å‡½æ•°çš„è¿‘ä¼¼å€¼123456789101112131415161718!æ­£å¼¦å‡½æ•°ç”¨æ³°å‹’çº§æ•°å±•å¼€ï¼šsinx=x-x^3/3!+x^5/5!-x^7/7!+...ã€‚è®¡ç®—æœ‰é™ç²¾åº¦èŒƒå›´å†…çš„å€¼ã€‚program main real , parameter:: pi=3.141592, err=1.e-6 integer, parameter:: max_terms=10 read *, x; x=x*pi/180 k=1; term=x; sin_=term do while((abs(term)>err) .and. (k<=max_terms)) term=-term*x*x/(2*k*(2*k+1)) k=k+1 sin_=sin_+term print *,k,sin_ end do print *,sin(x)end program main DO æ„é€ çš„ä¸€èˆ¬å½¢å¼12345[æ„é€ å:] DO [æ ‡å·][å¾ªç¯æ§åˆ¶]å—ç»ˆæ­¢è¯­å¥ ç”¨ä¸å¸¦å¾ªç¯æ§åˆ¶å˜é‡çš„DOæ„é€ æ±‚ä¸‹åˆ—å¼ $1^2+2^2+3^2+â€¦+m^2$ 12345678910111213141516171819! 1^2+2^2+3^2+...+m^2program main integer :: m m = 1 sum = 0 do if(m<1000) then sum = sum+m**2 m = m + 1 print *, m else EXIT end if end do! write(*,*) sumend program main

posts.text: [toc] IF ELSE THEN è¯­å¥12345678910PROGRAM MAIN REAL :: x; READ *, x IF(x>0.0 .and. x<1.0) THEN PRINT *, " åœ¨åŒºé—´(0, 1)ä¸­" ELSE IF(x<0 .and. x>-1) THEN PRINT *, "åœ¨åŒºé—´(-1,0)" ELSE PRINT *, "ä¸åœ¨åŒºé—´(0, 1)ä¸­" END IFEND PROGRAM MAIN tinyå‡½æ•° tiny(x)è¡¨ç¤ºæŸ¥è¯¢xçš„æœ€å°æ­£å€¼,xæ‰€èƒ½è¡¨ç¤ºçš„æœ€å°çš„æ•°ï¼Œè¿‘ä¼¼äº0ã€‚ CASEè¯­å¥ï¼šç»Ÿè®¡å­¦ç”Ÿè€ƒè¯•æˆç»©123456789101112131415161718192021222324program mainimplicit none !`implicit none`å³è®¾è®¡ä»»ä½•å’Œéšå«è¯´æ˜è¯­å¥æ— æ•ˆï¼Œæ‰€æœ‰å˜é‡éƒ½è¦æ˜¾å¼åœ°äººå·¥å£°æ˜ï¼Œä¸èƒ½æœªå£°æ˜å°±ç›´æ¥ä½¿ç”¨ï¼Œæœ‰æ•ˆåœ°é¿å…äº†å¯èƒ½çš„å¤§é‡é”™è¯¯ã€‚integer :: score,n0=0,n1=0,n2=0,n3=0,n4=0do read *, score if(score<0 .or. score>100) then print *,'æ»¡åˆ†=',n0,' ä¼˜=',n1,' è‰¯=',n2,' åŠæ ¼=',n3,' ä¸åŠæ ¼=',n4 exit else select case(score) !å…¥å£è¯­å¥, select case(è¡¨è¾¾å¼) case(100) !CASEè¯­å¥æ˜¯ä¸€æ¡å•ç‹¬çš„è¯­å¥ print *, 'æ»¡åˆ†'; n0=n0+1 case(85:99) !caseå€¼å¿…é¡»ä¸è¡¨è¾¾å¼çš„ç±»å‹ç›¸åŒ print *, 'ä¼˜ '; n1=n1+1 case(70:84) !ç»™å®šCASEæ„é€ ä¸­çš„caseå€¼èŒƒå›´ä¸èƒ½æœ‰é‡å  print *, 'è‰¯ '; n2=n2+1 !CASEå—å¯ä»¥æ˜¯ç©ºçš„ï¼Œä¹Ÿå¯ä»¥åŒ…å«å…¶å®ƒå—ï¼Œå…¶åµŒå¥—å½¢å¼ä¸å—IFç›¸åŒ case(60:69) print *, 'åŠæ ¼'; n3=n3+1 case default !å¯é€‰,æœ€å¤šåªèƒ½æœ‰ä¸€å¥;å½“caseè¡¨è¾¾å¼çš„å€¼åœ¨caseå€¼èŒƒå›´ä»¥å¤–æ—¶ï¼Œæ‰§è¡ŒCASE DEFAULTè¯­å¥åé¢çš„å— print *, 'ä¸åŠæ ¼'; n4=n4+1 end select !å‡ºå£è¯­å¥ end ifend doend program main åˆ†ä¸ºæ•´å‹ã€å­—ç¬¦å‹ã€é€»è¾‘å‹ä¸‰ç§ è¯»å…¥a,bï¼Œè‹¥a>bï¼Œåˆ™ç½®X=1.23ï¼Œå¦åˆ™ç½®X=32.1ï¼Œæ‰“å°Xå€¼ï¼›1234567891011program main real :: a,b,X read(*,*) a,b if(a>b) then X = 1.23 write(*,*) X else X = 32.1 print *,X end ifend program main è¯»å…¥a,b,c,dï¼Œè‹¥a+b>c+dï¼Œåˆ™X=1.1ï¼Œè‹¥a+b=cï¼Œåˆ™X=0.0ï¼Œè‹¥a+b<c+dï¼Œåˆ™X=-1.1ï¼Œè¾“å‡ºXå€¼ï¼›123456789101112131415161718!è¯»å…¥a,b,c,dï¼Œè‹¥a+b>c+dï¼Œåˆ™X=1.1ï¼Œè‹¥a+b=cï¼Œåˆ™X=0.0ï¼Œè‹¥a+b<c+dï¼Œåˆ™X=-1.1ï¼Œè¾“å‡ºXå€¼ï¼›program main real :: a,b,c,d,X read *, a,b,c,d if(a+b>c+d) then X = 1.1 write(*,*) X else if((a+b).eq.c) then X = 0.0 write(*,*) X else if((a+b).lt.(c+d)) then X = -1.1 print *, X else print *,"è¾“å…¥é”™è¯¯!!!" end ifend program main è¯»å…¥Sä¸S1ï¼Œå¦‚|S-S1|â‰¤10-7ï¼Œåˆ™ç½®Sä¸ºS1ã€‚123456789101112! è¯»å…¥Sä¸S1ï¼Œå¦‚|S-S1|â‰¤10-7ï¼Œåˆ™ç½®Sä¸ºS1ã€‚program main real :: S,S1 READ(*,*) S,S1 IF(ABS(S-S1).LE.(10-7)) THEN S = S1 PRINT *,"S,S1 = ",S,S1 ELSE PRINT *,"ERROR!!!" END IFend program main ç”¨IFæ„é€ åµŒå¥—æ–¹æ³•ç¼–ç¨‹12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728! ç”¨IFæ„é€ åµŒå¥—æ–¹æ³•ç¼–ç¨‹ï¼šè¯»å…¥Xï¼Œåˆ†ä¸‰ç§æƒ…å†µæ±‚å¾—Zå€¼ï¼Œå½“X<0æ—¶ï¼ŒZ=-100ï¼›! å½“X=0æ—¶ï¼Œåˆåˆ†ä¸‰ç§æƒ…å†µï¼ˆy<0ï¼Œåˆ™Z=sinXï¼›y=0ï¼Œåˆ™Z=0ï¼›y>0ï¼Œåˆ™Z=cosXï¼‰ï¼›! å½“X>0æ—¶ï¼ŒZ=100ï¼Œæ‰“å°Zå€¼ã€‚PROGRAM MAIN REAL :: X,Y,Z READ(*,*) X,Y IF(X<0) THEN Z = -100 PRINT *,Z PRINT *,Z ELSE IF(X.EQ.0) THEN IF(Y.LT.0) THEN Z = SIN(X) PRINT *,Z ELSE IF(Y.EQ.0) THEN Z = 0 PRINT *,Z ELSE IF(Y.GT.0) THEN Z = COS(X) PRINT *,Z END IF ELSE IF(X.GT.0) THEN Z = 100 PRINT *,Z END IFEND PROGRAM MAIN è¯»å…¥ä¸€ä¸ªæ•´å‹å˜é‡Nçš„å€¼ï¼Œç”¨CASEæ„é€ ç¼–ç¨‹1234567891011121314151617181920212223! è¯»å…¥ä¸€ä¸ªæ•´å‹å˜é‡Nçš„å€¼ï¼Œç”¨CASEæ„é€ ç¼–ç¨‹ï¼Œ! è‹¥Nï¼1ã€2ã€3ã€5ï¼Œåˆ™Yï¼Xï¼›Nï¼4ã€8ï¼Œåˆ™Yï¼X^2ï¼›Nï¼6ã€7ï¼Œåˆ™Yï¼X^3ï¼Œ! å…¶å®ƒæƒ…å†µåˆ™Y=0ï¼Œæ‰“å°Yå€¼PROGRAM MAIN INTEGER :: N,X,Y READ(*,*) N SELECT CASE(N) CASE(1,2,3,5) Y = X PRINT *, Y CASE(4,8) Y = X**2 PRINT *, Y CASE(6:7) Y = X**3 PRINT *, Y CASE DEFAULT Y = 0 PRINT *, Y END SELECTEND PROGRAM MAIN è®¾å˜é‡color_lightæ˜¯å­—ç¬¦å‹å˜é‡ï¼Œè¡¨ç¤ºç¯å…‰è‰²å½©123456789101112131415161718192021222324! è®¾å˜é‡color_lightæ˜¯å­—ç¬¦å‹å˜é‡ï¼Œè¡¨ç¤ºç¯å…‰è‰²å½©ï¼Œ! ç¼–ä¸€CASEæ„é€ ï¼Œå½“è¯¥å˜é‡å€¼æ˜¯çº¢è‰²(RED)åˆ™æ‰“å°STOPå­—æ ·ã€‚! å½“å˜é‡å€¼æ˜¯é»„è‰²(YELLOW)ï¼Œæ‰“å°WAITå­—æ ·ï¼Œå½“å€¼æ˜¯ç»¿è‰²(GREEN)æ‰“å°CROSSå­—æ ·ã€‚PROGRAM MAIN IMPLICIT none CHARACTER*1 color_light PRINT *,"è¯·è¾“å…¥ï¼šREDã€YELLOWã€GREENä»»æ„ä¸€ä¸ªï¼š" READ(*,*) color_light KEY_INPUT: SELECT CASE(color_light) CASE('RED') PRINT *,"STOP" CASE('YELLOW') PRINT *, "WAIT" CASE('GREEN') PRINT *, "CROSS" CASE DEFAULT PRINT *, "ERROR!!!!" this is the important functionax2 = ax1.twinx() # this is the important functionax2.plot(x, y2, 'g',label = "green")ax2.legend(loc="upper right")ax2.set_ylabel('Right')ax2.tick_params(axis='y',colors='red') # æ— è‰²ax.spines['left'].set_linewidth(2)ax.spines['right'].set_linewidth(2) å‚è€ƒ https://zhuanlan.zhihu.com/p/343719623 https://blog.csdn.net/qq_40211493/article/details/103261392 https://www.it1352.com/532711.html matplotlib_bar 123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627282930313233"""Hatching (pattern filled polygons) is supported currently in the PS,PDF, SVG and Agg backends only."""import matplotlib.pyplot as pltfrom matplotlib.patches import Ellipse, Polygonfig = plt.figure()ax1 = fig.add_subplot(131)ax1.bar(range(1, 5), range(1, 5), color='red', edgecolor='black', hatch="/")ax1.bar(range(1, 5), [6] * 4, bottom=range(1, 5), color='blue', edgecolor='black', hatch='//')ax1.set_xticks([1.5, 2.5, 3.5, 4.5])ax2 = fig.add_subplot(132)bars = ax2.bar(range(1, 5), range(1, 5), color='yellow', ecolor='black') + \ ax2.bar(range(1, 5), [6] * 4, bottom=range(1, 5), color='green', ecolor='black')ax2.set_xticks([1.5, 2.5, 3.5, 4.5])##{'/', '\', '|', '-', '+', 'x', 'o', 'O', '.', '*'}patterns = ('-', '+', 'x', '\\', '*', 'o', 'O', '.')for bar, pattern in zip(bars, patterns): bar.set_hatch(pattern)ax3 = fig.add_subplot(133)ax3.fill([1, 3, 3, 1], [1, 1, 2, 2], fill=False, hatch='\\')ax3.add_patch(Ellipse((4, 1.5), 4, 0.5, fill=False, hatch='*'))ax3.add_patch(Polygon([[0, 0], [4, 1.1], [6, 2.5], [2, 1.4]], closed=True, fill=False, hatch='/'))ax3.set_xlim((0, 6))ax3.set_ylim((0, 2.5))plt.show() Maplotlibåæ ‡è½´åè½¬12ax.invert_xaxis()ax.invert_yaxis() åæ ‡è½´LOG1234ax.set_xscale("log", base = 10)ax.set_yscale("log", base = 10)plt.xscale("log", base = 10)plt.yscale("log", base = 10) savefig1plt.savefig('xxx.tiff',dpi=300,transparent=True) Seaborn Seaborn

TCLå‘½ä»¤è®¡ç®—zæ–¹å‘çš„æ°¢é”®Hbonds_cal_z.tcl123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627282930313233343536373839404142434445464748495051525354555657585960616263646566#TCL VMD script to calculate Avg No. of HBonds for given Acceptor and Donor groups in the z direction ##Authour : KAPAKAYALA ANJI BABU# IIT KANPUR, INDIA.#Modified by : Dongsheng Chen#USAGE : Open VMD/Extensions - Tk console then execute script as " source hbonds_direction_z.tcl"##OUTPUT Files :: hbonds-details_new.dat ; which contains details of all given Donor & Acceptor atoms.# hbonds-z.dat ; which contains z position vs No.of Hbonds.#set outfile [open "hbonds-details-all.dat" w]#set hbzfile [open "hbonds-all-z.dat" w]#set hbzfile [open "hbonds-wat-wat-z.dat" w]set hbzfile [open "hbonds-wat-sdbs-z.dat" w]set n [ molinfo top get numframes]set sum 0for {set i 901} {$i <= $n} {incr i} {for {set j -34} {$j <=94} {incr j} {set k [expr $j]#set D [atomselect top "all and z<[expr $k+0.5] and z>=$k" frame $i] set D [atomselect top "type 411 to 412 and z<[expr $k+0.5] and z>=$k" frame $i] #set A [atomselect top "all" frame $i]#set A [atomselect top "type 411 to 412" frame $i]#set A [atomselect top "resid 1606 1607 3108 3109" frame $i]#set A [atomselect top "resid 1606 1607 1608 1609 3110 3111 3112 3113" frame $i]set A [atomselect top "resid 1606 1607 1608 1609 1610 1611 1612 1613 1614 1615 3116 3117 3118 3119 3120 3121 3122 3123 3124 3125" frame $i]set D_list [$D get {resname type serial }]set A_list [$A get {resname type serial }]set lists [measure hbonds 3.5 30 $D $A]set atoms [lindex $lists 0]set Num [llength $atoms] ##---------Writing OUTPUT----------------------##puts $outfile "========================================"#puts $outfile "Frame :: $i "#puts $outfile "DONARS_list ::\n$D_list"#puts $outfile ""#puts $outfile "Acceptors_list ::\n$A_list"#puts $outfile ""##puts "Hbonds List :: $lists"##set HBnum [llength $lists ]#puts ""##puts "No. of Hbonds :: $HBnum"#puts $outfile "HB Atoms:: $atoms"#puts $outfile ""#puts $outfile "No. of Hbonds:: $Num"puts $hbzfile "$i $k [expr $k+0.5] $Num"puts "$i $k [expr $k+0.5] :: No. of Hbonds = $Num"#------------------Calculating Avg HBonds--------#set sum [expr $sum + $Num ]#puts "Sum :: $sum"}}set Hbavg [expr $sum/$i]#puts $hbfile "Ang Hbonds :: $Hbavg"puts "===================================="puts "Ang Hbonds :: $Hbavg"puts "===================================="$D delete$A delete#close $outfileclose $hbzfile#lsort -unique [$sel get resname]#==========================================================## Written By ANJI BABU KAPAKAYALA ## Modifed By Dongsheng Chen ##==========================================================# å¯¼å…¥è½¨è¿¹ååœ¨VMD TkConsoleä¸­ä½¿ç”¨source Hbonds_cal_z.tclå‘½ä»¤æ‰§è¡Œè¯¥ä»£ç  å¸¸ç”¨å‘½ä»¤proc
